GSD.product_version: versions from v5.1 to before v5.15.66
GSD.description:
misc: fastrpc: fix memory corruption on open

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.66 by commit cf20c3533efc89578ace94fa20a9e63446223c72, it was introduced in version v5.1 by commit f6f9279f2bf0e37e2f1fb119d8832b8568536a04. For more details please see the references link.
